alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:30AM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches below 9000 feet and 12 to 18 inches above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
